suppress.notes: File: activation-1.1.1.jar Dependency: javax.activation:activation:1.1.1 Original Reported CPE: cpe:/a:oracle:java_se:1.1.1 Reason: False positive. This is the Java Activation Framework, not Oracle Java SE. CVE Count = 0.
